Decentralized Stochastic Optimal Power Flow Problem Considering Prohibited Operating Zones and Renewables Sources

Mahdi Pourakbari-Kasmaei (mahdi.pourakbari@aalto.fi), Senior Member, IEEE, and Jos√© Roberto Sanches Mantovani 
(mant@dee.feis.unesp.br), Member, IEEE.
